name: bdrv + al EoS - more waveforms 5 mx - ver-ing chris lundberg

wave_0_per_frame2=t2=sin(time*0.17)*0.5+0.5;

wave_0_per_frame4=
wave_0_per_point1=n=sample*6.283 + time*0.01;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=xp= 0;
wave_0_per_point4=yp= 1;
wave_0_per_point5=zp= sample*2;
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=ang=128*sample;
wave_0_per_point8=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_0_per_point9=xq=xp*sang + yp*cang;
wave_0_per_point10=yq=xp*cang - yp*sang;
wave_0_per_point11=zq=zp;
wave_0_per_point12=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_0_per_point13=
wave_0_per_point14=zp=zp*20+1;
wave_0_per_point15=xs=xp/zp ;
wave_0_per_point16=ys=yp/zp ;
wave_0_per_point17=
wave_0_per_point18=ang=sin(n*6+time);
wave_0_per_point19=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_0_per_point20=xq=xs*sang + ys*cang;
wave_0_per_point21=yq=xs*cang - ys*sang;
wave_0_per_point22=xs=xq;
wave_0_per_point23=ys=yq;
wave_0_per_point24=
wave_0_per_point25=x=xs + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point26=y=ys*1.333 + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point27=
wave_0_per_point28=tm=time*3;
wave_0_per_point29=
wave_0_per_point30=r=sin(n + tm)*0.5 + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point31=g=sin(n + tm + 1.1)*0.5 + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point32=b=sin(n + tm + 2.2)*0.5 + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point33=
wave_0_per_point34=a= sin(n*256)*0.5+0.5;
wave_0_per_point35=a=above(a,0.5)
wavecode_1_enabled=0

wave_1_per_frame2=t2=sin(time*0.17)*0.5+0.5
wave_1_per_frame3=
wave_1_per_point1=n=sample*6.283;
wave_1_per_point2=
wave_1_per_point3=xp= sin(n) * (sin(n*2)*0.5+0.5);
wave_1_per_point4=yp= cos(n) * (cos(n*(t1*3+1))*0.5+0.5);
wave_1_per_point5=zp= 0;
wave_1_per_point6=
wave_1_per_point7=ang=n*16*t2 + n;
wave_1_per_point8=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_1_per_point9=xq=xp;
wave_1_per_point10=yq=yp*sang + zp*cang;
wave_1_per_point11=zq=yp*cang - zp*sang;
wave_1_per_point12=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_1_per_point13=
wave_1_per_point14=
wave_1_per_point15=ang=time*0.2;
wave_1_per_point16=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_1_per_point17=xq=xp;
wave_1_per_point18=yq=yp*sang + zp*cang;
wave_1_per_point19=zq=yp*cang - zp*sang;
wave_1_per_point20=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_1_per_point21=
wave_1_per_point22=ang=time*0.11;
wave_1_per_point23=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_1_per_point24=xq=xp*sang + zp*cang;
wave_1_per_point25=yq=yp;
wave_1_per_point26=zq=xp*cang - zp*sang;
wave_1_per_point27=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_1_per_point28=
wave_1_per_point29=
wave_1_per_point30=zp=zp+4.1;
wave_1_per_point31=x=-xp/zp + 0.5;
wave_1_per_point32=y=yp/zp*1.333 + 0.5;
wave_1_per_point33=
wave_1_per_point34=tm=time*0.3;
wave_1_per_point35=s=sample + tm;
wave_1_per_point36=rr= s - int(s);
wave_1_per_point37=r=rr*rr;
wave_1_per_point38=
wave_1_per_point39=s=sample + 0.15 + tm;
wave_1_per_point40=gg= s - int(s);
wave_1_per_point41=g=gg*gg;
wave_1_per_point42=
wave_1_per_point43=s=sample + 0.3 + tm;
wave_1_per_point44=bb= s - int(s);
wave_1_per_point45=b=bb*bb;
wave_1_per_point46=
wave_1_per_point47=a=min( sample, 1-sample)*2;
wave_1_per_point48=a=pow(a,0.5)
wave_1_per_point49=

per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=
per_pixel_1=sy =1.4;
per_pixel_2=sx=sy
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x-0.5,uv.y-0.5);//*aspect.xy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float2 zz = uv1 *texsize.xy *q28;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`zz =mul(zz,float2x2(_qb));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 h1 = clamp(tan(zz.yx),-16,16) * cos(zz*2*q9);
warp_10=`
warp_11=`uv.xy += h1 * .01;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`float r = tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/6 + .001*time).x*16;
warp_14=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_15=`float sr = sin(r); float cr = cos(r);
warp_16=`uv6 = mul(uv6, float2x2(cr,sr,-sr,cr));
warp_17=`float3 mus = 1/(sqrt(uv6.y)) * ((.5-q30)+.03*q26);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 crisp = tex2D(sampler_main,uv) + .02*mus;
warp_20=`//crisp = lerp(crisp, crisp.bgr, saturate(crisp));
warp_21=`ret = crisp-.0 -.3* GetBlur3(uv) - rad/10 ;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float2 uv2 = uv;
comp_4=`uv2.x=1-uv2.x;
comp_5=`uv2 = .5+(uv2-.5)*.98;
comp_6=`uv = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*0.98;
comp_7=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
comp_8=`    float2 d2= texsize.zw*4;
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_11=`    float3 dx2= ( GetBlur1(uv2+float2(1,0)*d2)-GetBlur1(uv2-float2(1,0)*d2) );
comp_12=`
comp_13=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_14=`    float3 dy2 = ( GetBlur1(uv2+float2(0,1)*d2)-GetBlur1(uv2-float2(0,1)*d2) );
comp_15=`
comp_16=`float4 noise = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, ((uv.xyy+float3(lum(dx),lum(dy),0)*0.5)*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww).xyz*float3(1,1,0)*0.05
comp_17=`                                        + time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 );
comp_18=`float4 noise2= tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, ((uv2.xyy+float3(lum(dx2),lum(dy2),0)*0.5)*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww).xyz*float3(1,1,0)*0.05
comp_19=`                                        + time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 );
comp_20=`uv -= float2(lum(dx),lum(dy))*0.04;
comp_21=`uv2-= float2(lum(dx2),lum(dy2))*0.04;
comp_22=`
comp_23=`ret = abs(GetPixel(uv)+GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur2(uv)-GetBlur3(uv));
comp_24=`float3 ret2 = abs(GetPixel(uv2)+GetBlur1(uv2)-GetBlur2(uv2)-GetBlur3(uv2));
comp_25=`ret *= lum(noise)*3; 
comp_26=`ret2*= lum(noise)*3; 
comp_27=`ret = pow(ret,0.5);
comp_28=`ret2= pow(ret2,0.5);
comp_29=`ret2=.5-ret2;
comp_30=`ret-=.3-ret2;
comp_31=`}
